data.title: How much do Pentair Technical Products employees make?
data.meta_description: The average annual salary of Pentair Technical Products is estimated to be approximate $75,597 per year. The majority pay is between $66,582 to $85,309 per year. Visit Salary.com to find out Pentair Technical Products salary, Pentair Technical Products pay rate, and more.
data.text:
View salary at Pentair Technical Products by Job Title BETA

The average salary of Pentair Technical Products jobs will vary depending on the location, industry, category, and department. The table below shows the job titles you might be interested in and the salary range of different positions at Pentair Technical Products. A difference in pay for the same job title may be based on a number of factors, such as experience, training, level of education, skills and competencies, and so on. Chief Executive Officer jobs at Pentair Technical Products earn the most with an average annual salary of $585,191, while Supervisor, Purchasing jobs earn the least with an average annual salary of $71,545.

The estimate average salary for Pentair Technical Products employees is around $75,597 per year, or the hourly rate of Pentair Technical Products rate is $36. The highest earners in the top 75th percentile are paid over $85,309. Individual salaries will vary depending on the job, department, and location, as well as the employee’s level of education, certifications, and additional skills.

JOB TITLE SALARY RANGE AVERAGE SALARY COMPANY NAME Chief Executive Officer $448,431 - $736,014 $585,191 Pentair Technical Products Sales Director $122,751 - $155,068 $138,601 Pentair Technical Products Training Leader $72,341 - $89,196 $80,582 Pentair Technical Products Supervisor, Purchasing $64,033 - $80,351 $71,545 Pentair Technical Products

DISCLAIMER: The salary range presented here is an estimation that has been derived from our proprietary algorithm. It should be noted that this range does not originate from the company's factual payroll records or survey data.

1. How much does Pentair Technical Products in the United States pay?

Pentair Technical Products pays its employees an average of $75,597 per year. The average salary at Pentair Technical Products range from $66,582 to $85,309 per year. Chief Executive Officer jobs at Pentair Technical Products earn the most with an average annual salary of $585,191, while Supervisor, Purchasing jobs earn the least with an average annual salary of $71,545.

2. Do Pentair Technical Products employees get a higher salary than other similar companies?

The salary at Pentair Technical Products is lesser than Claddagh Electronics Ltd. The highest salary package reported for an employee at Pentair Technical Products is $85,309 per year, meanwhile the highest salary package reported for an employee at Claddagh Electronics Ltd is $118,342 per year.

3. How much does Pentair Technical Products pay compared to Claddagh Electronics Ltd?

The average annual salary at Pentair Technical Products is $75,597, or an hourly wage of $36, in comparison to Claddagh Electronics Ltd which pays $104,879 per year or $50 per hour.

4. Which job skills can boost a Training Leader salary at Pentair Technical Products?

Customer Service, Leadership and Initiative are key to a Training Leader job at Pentair Technical Products. Possessing these skills could lead to a higher salary. You can learn and develop high income skills now if you’re looking for a position at Pentair Technical Products.

5. What is the lowest salary at Pentair Technical Products?

The lowest paying job at Pentair Technical Products is Supervisor, Purchasing with an annual salary of $71,545 or an hourly rate of $36.
